import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './registerForm.css' const RegisterForm = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ name: '', lastname: '', email: '', password: '' }) const handleClickSignUp = () => { console.log(data); } const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setData({ ...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } return (

); } export default RegisterForm;
